name: 永远的弹幕少女芙兰 ~ The endless Danmaku by U.N Owen
name_original: 永远的弹幕少女芙兰 ~ The endless Danmaku by U.N Owen
description:
Flandre has become the strongest existence in Gensokyo.

But the strength has caused fear, and these fears have gathered into a mysterious power... Fran was finally locked here by the shadow from the outside world and Koishi.

Although it is just a danmaku game with rogue elements, the mystery behind it cannot be dispelled. Until... the space is shattered and collapsed, can the eternal Danmaku girl Fran get rid of all this? Or keep practicing playing and danmaku hide-and-seek...forever...

芙兰，成为了幻想乡最强的存在

但强大招致了恐惧，这些恐惧汇集成了一股玄秘的力量......芙兰最终还是被恋恋与外界之影关在了此处

虽然它只是一个有rogue元素的弹幕游戏，但它背后的疑团却无法散去。直到......空间破碎崩塌，永远的弹幕少女芙兰能否破除这一切呢？又或者是不断练习弹奏和弹幕捉迷藏...直到永远...
